name: large_tx_new_account
description: Triggers when a large transaction occurs shortly after account opening, indicating potential mule or misuse behavior.

name: sudden_freq_increase
description: Detects a sudden and abnormal spike in transaction activity compared to historical behavior.

name: large_debit_low_balance_hist
description: Identifies large debits inconsistent with historically low balances, suggesting unusual funding sources.

name: minor_large_tx
description: Flags high-value transactions involving minors, which may indicate misuse or proxy account usage.

name: elderly_large_tx
description: Identifies large transactions by elderly customers, potentially indicating coercion or fraud.

name: extreme_charity_tx
description: Flags exceptionally large charity-related transfers, which can be used for laundering or diversion.

name: extreme_inheritance_tx
description: Detects very large inheritance claims, often used as a justification for suspicious funds.

name: self_employed_large_tx
description: Detects unusually large transactions by self-employed customers, requiring source-of-funds validation.

name: reg_country_mismatch
description: Flags country mismatch between registration and activity, a common cross-border risk signal.

name: rapid_tx
condition: Time difference between consecutive transactions < 60 seconds
description: Flags rapid successive transactions that may indicate automation or abnormal usage.

name: sudden_amt_increase
description: Detects sudden spikes in transaction value inconsistent with normal behavior.

name: sudden_amt_drop
description: Identifies abrupt reductions in transaction amounts, often seen in probing activity.

name: burst_large
description: Flags high-value transaction bursts over a short period.

name: device_shared
description: Detects devices shared across multiple users, common in fraud rings.

name: bullion_large
description: Detects large bullion-related transactions, requiring source and legitimacy checks.
mainDomain: Business KYC & Entity Due Diligence Rules

name: large_tx_charity
description: Flags large transactions involving charities, which may be misused for fund diversion.

name: high_freq_to_ben_7d
condition: Transactions to same beneficiary > 5 in last 7 days
description: Detects high-frequency transfers to a single beneficiary, a structuring indicator.

name: high_freq_from_sender_7d
condition: Transactions from same sender > 5 in last 7 days
description: Flags repeated transfers from a single sender, indicating potential layering.

name: ben_ofac_fuzzy_match
description: Detects partial or fuzzy sanctions matches for beneficiaries.

name: sender_ofac_fuzzy_match
description: Flags potential fuzzy sanctions matches for senders.

name: newly_established_ben_entity
description: Flags newly formed beneficiary entities, a common mule typology.

name: newly_established_sender_entity
description: Detects newly established sender entities, often used in rapid fund movement.

name: high_tx_type_variance
description: Detects high variability in transaction types, indicating inconsistent or suspicious behavior.

name: crypto_wallet_large
description: Flags large-value transactions involving crypto wallets, requiring source-of-funds review.

name: crypto_hash_large
condition: Crypto transaction hash present AND amount > 50,000
description: Detects high-value blockchain-referenced transactions, indicating direct crypto exposure.

name: defi_large
description: Detects large DeFi transactions, which may bypass traditional controls.

name: dex_large
description: Flags large decentralized exchange transactions, increasing counterparty opacity.

name: bridge_used
description: Identifies use of cross-chain bridges, often linked to laundering via chain hopping.

name: l2_used
description: Flags activity on Layer-2 networks, which can reduce traceability.

name: crypto_for_id_large
condition: Crypto foreign ID present AND amount > 200,000
description: Detects large crypto transactions tied to foreign identifiers, increasing jurisdictional risk.

name: massive_data_exposure
description: Identifies large-scale personal data exposure incidents.

name: large_data_breach_notifs
description: Flags large-scale breach notifications, indicating severe incidents.

name: document_upload_night_time
description: Flags off-hours document uploads, possibly suspicious or automated.

name: ben_name_consecutive_digits
description: Detects beneficiary names with numeric sequences, often anomalous or system-generated.

name: low_ocr_quality_document
description: Flags poor OCR document quality, which may hinder verification.

name: datacenter_ip_used
description: Identifies transactions from datacenter IPs, which may indicate automation.

name: ben_in_sanctioned_region
condition: Beneficiary country in sanctioned region = YES
description: Flags beneficiaries in restricted or sanctioned regions.

name: unknown_sof
description: Flags entities with unknown or unverified source of funds.

name: unknown_sow
description: Detects entities with unknown or unverified source of wealth.

name: unclear_purpose
description: Flags accounts where intended purpose is not clearly stated.

name: jobless_large_tx
description: Detects high-value transactions by unemployed individuals, a potential risk signal.

name: crypto_sector_large
description: Flags large transactions in crypto-related sectors, high-risk activity.

name: gamble_sector_large
description: Detects large transactions in gambling-related businesses, high-risk for AML.

name: ngo_large
description: Flags large NGO transactions, potential fund diversion risk.

name: cash_intense_large
description: Detects high-value transactions in cash-intensive businesses.

name: mining_large
description: Flags large transactions in mining sector, subject to high-risk controls.

name: import_export_large
description: Detects high-value import/export transactions, often cross-border.

name: realestate_large
description: Flags large real estate transactions, potentially layering.

name: jewelry_large
description: Detects high-value jewelry sector transactions, often cash-heavy.

name: msb_large
description: Flags large transactions in money service businesses, AML-sensitive.

name: forex_sector_large
description: Detects large forex transactions, high-risk for AML/CFT.

name: extreme_fraud_score
description: Flags transactions with extremely high fraud scores, indicating high likelihood of fraudulent activity.

name: banned_device_used
description: Detects use of devices previously flagged for fraud or abuse.

name: excessive_account_linkage
description: Flags entities linked to multiple accounts, indicating structuring or layering.

name: high_risk_email_score
description: Detects high-risk email addresses, potentially linked to fraud or phishing.

name: high_risk_phone_score
description: Detects high-risk phone numbers, potentially linked to fraud schemes.

name: sender_hr_large
condition: Sender from high-risk country AND amount > 50,000
description: Detects large transactions from high-risk countries, increasing AML risk.

name: ben_hr_large
condition: Beneficiary from high-risk country AND amount > 50,000
description: Flags large transactions to high-risk countries.

name: large_cross_border_2
description: Detects large cross-border transactions, AML sensitive.

name: large_intl
description: Flags large international transactions, AML monitoring.

name: forex_high
description: Flags high-value foreign exchange transactions.

name: remit_high
description: Flags high-value remittance transactions.

name: wire_high
description: Detects high-value wire transfers, AML sensitive.

name: fx_high
description: Flags large foreign exchange transactions, high-risk for money laundering.

name: large_cancel
description: Detects large transactions that were cancelled, potential risk or audit interest.

name: manual_large
description: Flags large manually processed transactions, potential bypass of automated controls.

name: large_usd
description: Flags large USD transactions, potentially high risk.

name: large_cash
description: Flags large cash transactions, often higher AML risk.

name: large_cross_border
condition: Amount > 200,000 AND Sender country ≠ Beneficiary country
description: Flags large cross-border transactions, higher monitoring priority.

name: large_crypto
description: Flags large crypto transactions, potential risk of anonymity/illicit activity.

name: large_gamble
description: Flags large gambling-related transactions, regulatory scrutiny.

name: large_fx
description: Flags large foreign exchange transactions, potential compliance risk.

name: large_pending
description: Flags large pending transactions, could be high-risk if delayed or unreviewed.

name: large_without_ref
description: Flags large transactions without reference, poor traceability.

name: large_online
description: Flags large online transactions, potential fraud risk.

name: large_to_short_name
description: Flags large transactions to accounts with very short names, unusual pattern.

name: large_from_short_name
description: Flags large transactions from accounts with very short names, suspicious.

name: large_to_weak_acct
description: Flags large transactions to weakly structured accounts, potential fraud.

name: large_from_weak_acct
description: Flags large transactions from weakly structured accounts, high risk.

name: large_to_paypal_like
condition: Amount > 400,000 AND Beneficiary institution contains PAYPAL
description: Flags large payments to PayPal-like platforms, often riskier channels.

name: large_from_paypal_like
condition: Amount > 450,000 AND Sender institution contains PAYPAL
description: Flags large payments from PayPal-like platforms, high-risk monitoring.

name: large_agent
description: Flags large agent-mediated transactions, higher AML concern.

name: large_gift
description: Flags large gift transactions, could be structuring or unusual transfers.

name: large_loan
description: Flags large loan-related transactions, potential unusual activity.

name: structuring_like_1
description: Detects possible structuring patterns in transfers just below reporting thresholds.

name: structuring_like_2
description: Another structuring detection for amounts near regulatory limits.

name: round_amt_high
description: Flags large round-number transactions, often indicative of structured or artificial amounts.

name: round_amt_high2
description: Flags large semi-round transactions, similar to R23 but more granular.

name: night_large
description: Detects large late-night transactions, unusual activity outside normal business hours.

name: weekend_large
description: Detects large weekend transactions, potential unusual activity.

name: atm_large
description: Flags large ATM withdrawals, often high-risk or suspicious.

name: crypto_large
description: Flags large crypto transactions, higher anonymity and fraud risk.

name: crypto_many_hops
description: Flags crypto transactions with many hops from high-risk clusters, indicative of laundering.

name: gambling_large
description: Detects large gambling-related transactions, regulatory risk.

name: gamble_win_large
description: Flags large wins, potential payout laundering patterns.

name: gamble_loss_large
description: Flags large losses, could indicate high-stakes unusual behavior.

name: large_to_hr
description: Flags large transfers to high-risk countries.

name: large_from_hr
description: Flags large transfers from high-risk countries.

name: hidden_crypto_ref
description: Detects transactions referencing crypto in narrative fields.

name: hidden_exchange_ref
description: Detects transactions referencing exchanges, possibly crypto or FX.

name: hidden_cash_ref
description: Flags transactions with cash-related references, often higher AML risk.

name: suspicious_invoice
description: Flags transactions with invoice references, potential fraudulent activity.

name: suspicious_services
description: Flags services-related transactions, potential structuring or illicit activity.

name: suspicious_consult
description: Flags consulting-related transactions, often used for hiding illicit transfers.

name: tr_large
condition: Travel Rule Message exists AND Amount > 100,000
description: Flags large transactions under Travel Rule, requiring enhanced scrutiny.

name: tr_inbound_large
description: Detects large inbound Travel Rule transactions, high-risk transfers.

name: tr_outbound_large
description: Detects large outbound Travel Rule transactions, high-risk transfers.

name: tr_failed
description: Flags failed Travel Rule messages, potential compliance gaps.

name: tr_pending_large
description: Detects large pending transactions, may need urgent attention.
